verbs.description: [ARG0: sf pension board] votes to [V: divest] [ARG2: from five fossil fuel companies] [ARG1: the board of the san francisco employees’ retirement] system has voted unanimously to divest from five fossil fuel companies the vote calls for divestment from hess corp gulfport energy corp qep resources inc wpx energy inc and apache corp because of their high climate transition risk additionally it restricts future investment in two other companies crescent point energy and arc resources though the pension fund currently is not currently invested in them the companies’ approach to climate policy as well as their fossil fuel reserves and overall financial health contributed to the decision to classify them as high - risk apache corp twitter nbc hess corp sfers san francisco gulfport energy crescent point energy hearst journalism fellow hess corporation san francisco employees connecticut post reuters arc resources arizona fossil fuel director arizona state university president sophia kunthara retirement system wpx energy brian stansbury qep resources inc wpx energy inc pension los angeles andrew collins gulfport energy corp
